sections.heading: 01|Definitions pertaining to jurisdiction and venue
sections.text: Effective:March 23, 2016Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 161 - 131st General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) As used in Chapters 2931. to 2953. of the Revised Code, "magistrate" includes county court judges, police justices, mayors of munic

sections.heading: 03, inclusive, of the Revised Code, do not affect, modify, or limit the jurisdiction of municipal courts
sections.text: All municipal court judges have jurisdiction within the territory for which they were elected or appointed in all cases of violation of Chapters 4301. and 4303. of the Revised Code and of prosec
